infos.value: A report from the field, Your Grace. It seems that Fennes reinforcements are heading this way, one after another.
Seems word of our leaving the castle has already reached Muraga. There's more to him than I thought.
Master, what do you make of Muraga's movements?
That savage... It would seem that he's wary of you.
King Oelde stubbornly refused to send you into the battle against Fennes.
That's why Muraga is afraid of you, Lord Sterne. You must be what they call a secret weapon? Hah hah hah.
You're saying Father kept me back for a time like this...?
Well, now we have a chance to seize victory, slight as it may be.
That means Muraga could be underestimating Lord Mont's abilities.
Insightful as always Master. I reached a similar conclusion myself.
Maybe his skill with a blade is lacking in comparison to yours, Lord Sterne. However...
He has seen war more times than one could count. Sometimes flowers bloom even on the battlefield.
Well then, shall we? I really must get loosened up. I've grown stiff from serving in the castle.
